name: Bert Ore Cruncher's Mining Frenzy
description:
Mine more ore than your opponent! time your hits well for an early lead before the button "massh-athon" commences in phase 3!

"Patroklos" Nikolaos Kalarakis - Student ID: up2140416 - Game Design (All game art, game design and Sound effects)
